function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertain relationship between virus survival and environmental factors","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of virus survival and transmission, leading to ineffective mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Conducting further studies to confirm the relationship between environmental factors and virus survival","Technologies":"Laboratory testing, environmental monitoring equipment","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inconsistent transmission results in animal models","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately predicting and mitigating virus transmission in real-world scenarios","Mitigation":"Conducting additional animal studies to better understand the role of environmental conditions on transmission","Technologies":"Animal research facilities, environmental chambers","People":"Animal researchers, veterinarians, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Rapid forced airflow rates affecting virus exposure time","Impact":"Challenges in interpreting and applying animal model data to real-world conditions","Mitigation":"Adjusting experimental conditions to mimic natural airflow rates and exposure times","Technologies":"Flow measurement devices, environmental chambers","People":"Animal researchers, veterinarians, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
